content.en: Handwritten character recognition: Researchers have been exploring how different algorithms can improve the recognition of handwritten characters. They have investigated the use of neural network technology, character recognition technology, convolutional neural networks, deep learning technology, machine learning techniques, artificial intelligence neural networks, image processing, deep residual networks, and optimized models like LeNet-5 and ShuffleNet. These algorithms have shown promise in enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of recognizing various handwritten scripts, including Chinese, Tifinagh, Hindi, Bangla-Meitei Mayek, Kurdish, Tamil, and Devanagari characters.
content.da: Håndskrevet tegn-genkendelse: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan forskellige algoritmer kan forbedre genkendelsen af håndskrevne tegn. De har undersøgt brugen af neurale netværksteknologier, tegn-genkendelsesteknologier, konvolutionelle neurale netværk, dyb læring-teknologier, maskinlæringsteknikker, kunstig intelligens-neurale netværk, billedbehandling, dybe residualnetværk og optimerede modeller som LeNet-5 og ShuffleNet. Disse algoritmer har vist lovende resultater i at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af at genkende forskellige håndskrevne skriftsystemer, herunder kinesisk, Tifinagh, hindi, Bangla-Meitei Mayek, kurdisk, tamil og devanagari-tegn.
